data.title: the orleans hotel and casino in las vegas : george carlin
data.meta_description: pop culture landmarks and locations from movies, music, television, literature, comic books, video games & more
data.text:
Located about a mile off the strip, The Orleans is considered a locals casino in the city of sin.

George Carlin gave his last stand-up performance there on June 6, 2008. He died on June 22 at the age of 71.
